resources.string: A one-stop to read Malayalam Newspapers!

News Malayalam is a simple and very basic web-based application allowing users to quickly select and read a number of popular Malayalam Newspapers. This app doesn\'t have any Ads or trackers included. The Ads shown (if any) on this app are directly from the respective publishers. Moreover, no personal or private information about you or your device is collected or transmitted by this app.\n\nPlease note that this application has nothing to do with the contents of the news. They are simply loaded from the official web-page of the news publishers. The respective publishers deserve all the credits!
Failed to connect with Google Play Billing client!
Please select the first Newspaper you like to read on this app. It will be later changed to the last one you read.
Invite your friends to try News Malayalam
Rate or/and Review News Malayalam in GooglePlay
Found some bugs in News Malayalam? Click here to raise an issue at GitHub!
Get News Malayalam %s, a one-stop to read Malayalam Newspapers, from GooglePlay: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.sunilpaulmathew.newsmalayalam
News Malayalam is an open-source application which is ready to accept contributions from the development community. Click here to check out the source code!
Please Note: Buying any of this product will award you a supporter badge here!

If you like to appreciate the efforts of the developer to provide this application entirely free, non-intrusive and without ads, please consider supporting the development in some way. Click here to know more. Thank you!
